ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'This is a Straight Path to Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: (To which God) said: "This way is right by Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Allah said: "Here is the path that leads straight to Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: God said, "The path which leads to Me is a straight
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Said Allah, “This path* leads straight towards Me.” (* The path of the chosen bondmen.)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: (Allah) said: "This is the way which will lead straight to Me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: This is a right way with Me:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Said He, 'This is for Me a straight path:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He said: This is a right course incumbent upon Me:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: God said, "This is the path which leads straight to Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Allah said: this is the path leeding unto Me straight.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘This is the path [leading] straight to Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (Allah) said: "This (way of My sincere servants) is indeed a way that leads straight to Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: (Allah) said: "This is the Way which will lead straight to Me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He (Allah) said: 'This is for Me the Right Path
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “This is a right way with Me.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [Allah] said, "This is a path [of return] to Me [that is] straight.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [15:41] He, [God] exalted be He, said, ‘This is a straight path [leading] to Me,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He said) then Allah, Exalted is He, said: (This is a right course) a noble and honoured course; it is also said that this means: it is incumbent upon Me to make those who obeyed you and those who entered with you cross; it is also said that this means: an established straight path which He is pleased with; it is also said that this means: this is a lofty course (incumbent upon Me):
